mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT h.HISTORY_NO, h.MEMBER_NO, h.COURSE_ID, h.COURSE_TYPE, h.VIEW_DATE, r.ROAD_NAME AS title, r.ROAD_LOCATION AS location, r.ROAD_COST AS price, r.ROAD_INTRO AS intro, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY h.VIEW_DATE DESC) AS rnum FROM COURSE_VIEW_HISTORY h JOIN ROAD r ON h.COURSE_ID = r.ROAD_NO WHERE h.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*)FROM COURSE_VIEW_HISTORY WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_VIEW_HISTORY(MEMBER_NO, COURSE_ID, COURSE_TYPE) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{courseId}, #{courseType})
mapper.update: UPDATE COURSE_VIEW_HISTORY SET VIEW_DATE = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
